pacapt.title: pacman + apt = pacapt
pacapt.intro:
pacapt is an Arch's pacman-like package manager for some Unices. Actually this Bash script provides a wrapper for system's package manager. For example, on CentOS machines, you can install htop with command: `pacapt -S htop` 

----
[Collaborative notes on HackMD](https://hackmd.io/c/coscup18-arch/%2Fcoscup18-arch-pacapt)

Carl Su.intro:
# 社群經歷
Arch Linux Taiwan 共同發起人
Docker Taipei 共同發起人
Docker Hack Day 台北場 主辦、評審
Hacking Thursday 值日生
Mozilla 台灣社群 志工
COSCUP 2015 開源工作坊 講師
COSCUP 2016 LINE Bot 寫扣手 評審
COSCUP 2017, 2018 社群議程 協調人

# 近期分享

前端工程師也會 Makefile (Vue.js 台灣)
